name: Ammo Box
description: This small portable ammo box refills half of your weapon's extra ammunition, including special ammunition types.

name: Medical Pack
description: A portable medical kit that heals 100 health. Deployable in active health emergencies.

name: Tool Box
description: A portable toolkit that refills some dwindling supplies in a tight spot.

name: Stalker Beetle
description: Stalker Beetles are bred to find and track prey, giving hunters a view from above. As a last resort, they can sacrifice themselves to cause a small explosion hampering anuthing caught in the radius.

name: Choke Beetle
description: Choke Beetles are bred to find and track prey, giving hunters a view from above. They have also evolved to explose into a cloud of suffocating gas, which they themselves are immune to.

name: Poison Bomb
description: On detonation emits a persistant, deadly cloud. Anything caught in or that passes through the cloud will be poisoned.

name: Hive Bomb
description: Poisonous wasps emerge from this bomb to terrorize anyone unfortunate enough to be in the area. However it has no effect on monsters.

name: Flash Bomb
description: Home made, mercury based, blinding light bomb. Capable of disorienting several targets at once.

name: Concertina Bomb
description: Spring-loaded razorwire coil that unfolds violently when thrown. Shreds and entangles anything that tries to move through.

name: Chaos Bomb
description: Set of firecrackers that can be used to temporarily distract nearby enemies. Duration of about 30 seconds.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: Dynamite charge in a sticky frame that can be attached to objects and enemies. Its eight-second fuse doubles the detonation time of a dynamite stick.

name: Frag Bomb
description: Frag bombs send lethal shrapnel over a large area, lacerating nearby enemies. unlike dynamite however, the blast is not strong enough to destroy doors or concertina wire.

name: Fire Bomb
description: Flammable liquid in a glass container that bursts on impact. Spreads burning liquid over a large area.

name: Liquid Fire Bomb
description: Flammable liquid in a glass container. Burns on the surface of water. Internal steel balls cause it to burst on impact.

name: Hellfire Bomb
description: Flammable liquid in a glass container that bursts on impact and creates a massive fireball.

name: Dynamite Stick
description: A dynamite stick that detonates with a massive blast after four seconds.

name: Wawed Dynamite Stick
description: A dynamite stick with a modified powder fuse that enables detonation under water.

name: Dynamite Bundle
description: A bundle of several dynamite sticks. Why only bring one?

name: Big Bundle Dynamite
description: A bundle of many dynamite sticks. When something really needs to be blown up.

name: Antidote Shot (weak)
description: Instantly cures and prevents all poison effects. Physical damage associated with poison attacks still applies.

name: Vitality Shot (weak)
description: A shot which immediately restores 75 health.

name: Regeneration Shot (weak)
description: A shot that continually restores health over a short duration. However, health regenerates at a reduced rate.

name: Stamina Shot (weak)
description: A shot which immediately restores all stamina and stops further depletion for 5 minutes.

name: Antiote Shot
description: Instantly cures and prevents all poison effects. Physical damage associated with poison attacks still applies.

name: Vitality Shot
description: A shot which immediately restores all health.

name: Regeneration Shot
description: A shot that continuously restores health until fully healed. It also makes health regeneration start instantly when you receive damage. However, health regenerates at a reduced rate.

name: Stamina Shot
description: A shot which immediately restores all stamina and stops further depletion for 10 minutes.
